item.title: ‘Predator: Badlands’ Thrills Comic-Con With First 15 Minutes and Alternate ‘Killer of Killers’ Ending With Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny Glover
item.description: “Predator: Badlands” director Dan Trachtenberg has a long history with Hall H. For eight years in a row, he lined up and waited overnight to witness some of San Diego Comic-Con’s most epic moments, fr
